Safe HaskellSafe
LanguageHaskell2010

Failure.Fail

Description

The interface for Fail types

Since: failure-0.1.0

Synopsis
  • class Fail a where

    Documentation

    class Fail a where Source #

    The main class of Fails.

    Types which implement Fail are called failures.

    backtrace evaluates to the ordered list of failures

    cause returns the underlying cause of this failure, if it is an error that wraps other errors. Returns Nothing if this failure does not have another error as its underlying cause.

    Since: failure-0.1.0

    Methods

    backtrace :: a -> [a] Source #

    cause :: a -> Maybe a Source #

    The Fail implementation for the concrete Error type

    Since: failure-0.1.0
